Name: Telescope
Description: A telescope is a device that measures astronomical phenomena.

Properties.Name: Housed in
Properties.Description: Where is the telescope housed/functionaing from (usually a land-based observatory, can be a spacecraft such as a satellite)

Properties.Name: Operational altitude
Properties.Description: At what altitude from mean sea level does this device operate at?

Properties.Name: Operational period
Properties.Description: Dated range when this telescope was operational for astronomical observations

Properties.Name: Operational platform
Properties.Description: Where is this telescope based? Land, aircraft, space station, ship?

Properties.Name: Type of telescope
Properties.Description: What kind of telescope is this?
